sentences.sContent: Mammals have an inborn fear of snakes.
Good taste is inborn and cannot be learned.
sentences.sCn: 好的鉴赏力是与生俱来的，无法通过后天习得。

remMethod.val: in(内) + born(出生) → 与生俱来的 → 天生的

trans.tranCn: 天生的, 生来的, 先天的
trans.tranOther: an inborn quality or ability is one you have had naturally since birth
